name: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and introductory JavaScript.

name: JavaScript Basics
description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript programming for web development.

name: React Frontend Development
description: Build modern, responsive web applications with the React.js library.

name: Node.js Back-End Development
description: Learn server-side programming with Node.js and build robust back-end systems.

name: Python Programming
description: Discover the world of Python programming for various applications and use cases.

name: Data Science Fundamentals
description: Get started with data science and analytics using Python and data manipulation libraries.

name: Machine Learning with Python
description: Explore machine learning concepts and build predictive models with Python.

name: Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare
description: Apply artificial intelligence techniques to healthcare and medical data analysis.

name: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Learn essential cybersecurity concepts and practices to secure digital environments.
